name: Orange Boy Demo
description:
A demo of the gameplay of Orange Boy, a story-filled adventure packed into a platformer. 

Follow along Orange Boy as he journeys through the land searching for a purpose. (Title TBD)

Use WASD to move. Spacebar to attack (must be holding weapon).

Get to the end of the level! (No continuation currently programmed)

Special thanks to Eugenia Yoh for the art!
